settings.editor:
An Enrolment Application electronically signed by both parents/guardians is required to place a child’s name on the waitlist. During the application process you will be asked to upload a copy of the child’s birth certificate . School reports are required for children applying for Year 1 onwards.

Application Fee: A non-refundable application fee of $200 (per student) must be paid at the time of application. Applications can only be processed with the application fee and required documentation.

settings.invalid_message: There's something wrong. The form is invalid.
